column5: nice...  why did i come home????

awesome job!!!  i have been out a few times with the bow, now im waiting on my crossbow to get back from barnett, it had a cracked trigger housing, and im going crazy seeing all these deer on the move and cant get out after them.   jason
Because "SHE" said so. Havent you learned yet.LOL   Still enjoy opening this thread and seeing that nice buck.
this really make sme want to go out asap.

Nice little buck the brother in law shot today.... used his black powder riffle.... from what we talked about, one shot.... dropped it right in it's tracks.... nice broad shot.  Being careful at what I like to show in my hunting reports and considering the younger viewers out there, the pics are shown as links.  ***** CAUTION ***** The following links are not suitable for younger viewers, parental guidance and viewer discretion is advised  Happy Hunter  Second pic  Hope you enjoy Leechman
Congrats to your brother inlaw thats a nice buck  Rob
maaaan your getting my all riled up here....CANT WAIT for the first week of December    Hawk
Just bore sighted in my new savage 270 wsm then to the range this weekend hope it goes like this For me congrats good shooting
Soon Bro,very soon.  Nice kill.
Thanks Rob, sure is a nice buck.... will relay your comments to him   I hear ya hawk.... Can't wait either.... leaving this coming Friday for a week at deer camp   Thanks misfish
I got a deer tag today:P gotta find someone to go with.
Super Matt   hope you find someone to go with
As do i since this will be my first time out.
Matt I remember seeing a post from you about going for a non restricted course.  Since you got a tag that means you pass.... congratulation
i passed both courses I am sticking with my bow for now as it takes like 12 weeks for my PAL to come in.  Also that buck looks awesome
Awesome Matt... Thanks and will relay your comment about the buck to my brother in law.
Oh ya...thats the stuff Nice Buck!  One week for me, and I'm excited to say the least! Been counting the minutes since last Fall LOL!
Thanks Cookslav and best of luck to ya
Nice buck time for me to join this sport!!!
Thanks silvio... I'm sure that once you try it... you'll love it.  It's a great and challenging sport

I always wanted to take it up as a kid but my mom wouldn't let me just yet now she has faced it its not a faze just something I always loved and is no longer holding my back. I plan to do the course over Christmas or march break if there offering it.

With that positive attitude you will succeed.  Been hunting since I'm 12 years old and just can't get enough of it My first few years weren't all that good but with time gain lot's more experience and a good friend of mine showed me how to become a better hunter.   So far in 31 years of hunting only were able to successfully shoot 5 deers.  Three of the racks are hung up on the wall and everyday looking at them remember each and every moment.  Best of luck to you
Thanks bud!
awesome buck...i leave friday for a 2 week hunt, my first year hunting i cant wait !
Thanks carll2 and good luck to ya I'll be watching for your report
nice buck congrats
Thanks covette  Everyone thanks for your kind comments I will make sure to convey them to my bro in law Leechman
Congrats to your brother in-law on a nice animal.

Thanks smokey Just receive an email from him and the story is that the deer, when he saw it was on the move and had to bark/yell 3 times in order for the deer to stop before him @40 yards,  black powder, you only get one shot and got him through the lungs and drop right in it's tracks.  He also says to thank everyone for the kind comments Leechman
